parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per Disease Milestone per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.SMSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness of subject records. Should be assigned to be consistent chronological order.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: SMSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.MIDS

datasetVariables.description: Name of the specific Disease Milestone. For types of Disease Milestone that can occur multiple times, the name will end with a sequence number. Example: "HYPO1".
datasetVariables.label: Disease Milestone Instance Name
datasetVariables.name: MIDS

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.MIDSTYPE

datasetVariables.description: The type of Disease Milestone. Example: "HYPOGLYCEMIC EVENT".
datasetVariables.label: Disease Milestone Type
datasetVariables.name: MIDSTYPE

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.SMSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: State date/time of Milestone Instance, if Milestone is an intervention or event, or date of Milestone if Milestone is a finding.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Milestone
datasetVariables.name: SMSTDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.SMENDTC

datasetVariables.description: End date/time of Disease Milestone Instance.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Milestone
datasetVariables.name: SMENDTC

modelDatasetVariable.title: Study Day of Start of Milestone

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.SMSTDY

self.title: Study Day of Start of Milestone

datasetVariables.description: Study day of start of Disease Milestone Instance, relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Start of Milestone
datasetVariables.name: SMSTDY

modelDatasetVariable.title: Study Day of End of Milestone

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable SM.SMENDY

self.title: Study Day of End of Milestone

datasetVariables.description: Study day of end of Disease Milestone Instance, relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of End of Milestone
datasetVariables.name: SMENDY

description: A special-purpose domain that is designed to record the timing, for each subject, of disease milestones that have been defined in the Trial Disease Milestones (TM) domain. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C147184, 2018-06-29)
label: Subject Disease Milestones
name: SM
